tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Over my two consultations, one video and one in-person, Dr. Piyusha Shankar has been friendly, helpful, thorough, and clear in her explanations.

The only downside is a survey app called Practo, whose volume of messages borders on harassment.  For one in-person consult, I received at least seven contacts (messages and emails), where two would have sufficed - one appointment reminder and one post-appointment survey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Really good dr very well explained me what and why she s going to do this kind of treatment and was excellent without any pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Excellent as always   I think these three words are enough for statement. Please do not force to write 100 words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Explained the issue during a routine check up and clean up for my son. Told us the filling wasn't necessary at this point and if we took care, then we could avoid the procedure. It was our decision to go back to her. She is very thorough in her work and doesn't stop till she's not satisfied with the procedure. Very patient and devotes a lot of time to you. 

The clinic gives appointments in such a manner that there is hardly any wait time.

tags: None
review:
Recently visited Baydental practice for a crown treatment
Met dr Piyusha for the first time She is a very warm and a friendly doctor She explained to me very well the treatment i required and was very particular as to how the crown fitted 
She made the entire treatment very precise and comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It is a Very clean clinic, friendly doctor and assistants, and they make sure there is minimal discomfort

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Docyor Piyusha was  Very polite and efficient . She checked my teeth thoroughly.  Gave good tops on dental hygiene.
